en.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
en.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, their ATK is increased by {{8//10//12//14//16%}} in this battle. This effect can stack up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by {{12//15//18//21//24%}} for 2 turn(s).

zh.name: 记一位星神的陨落
zh.description: 当装备者施放攻击时，使装备者本场战斗中的攻击力提高{{8//10//12//14//16%}}，该效果最多叠加4层。当装备者击破敌方目标弱点后，造成的伤害提高{{12//15//18//21//24%}}，持续2回合。
